faqs.question: What is the Python Norte 2025?
faqs.answer: Python Norte 2025 is the largest event about the Python programming language in the North region. It is supported by various local and regional events, culminating in a friendly and itinerant meeting within the North region.

faqs.question: Do I get a certificate for participating in the Python Norte 2025?
faqs.answer: Yes! By participating in the Python Norte you will receive an email with a certificate of participation of the event.

faqs.question: Where and when will the Python Norte 2025 be held? In-person or online?
faqs.answer: The Python Norte 2025 will be held in-person. More information coming soon.

faqs.question: What is the event schedule?
faqs.answer: The event schedule will be available on our social media as soon as possible. And on our event schedule site.
